entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
